# ASError.Code.pickerRestricted

**Case**

The picker can’t be used because the app is in the background.

## Declaration

```swift
case pickerRestricted
```

## Picker errors

- **ASError.Code.pickerAlreadyActive**: The picker received a show request when it was already active.
